# transform3D

**Instance Property**

The 3D transform applied to the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var transform3D: CATransform3D { get set }
```

## Configuring position

- **frame**: The frame rectangle, which describes the item’s location and size in its section’s coordinate system.
- **bounds**: The bounds rectangle, which describes the item’s location and size in its own coordinate system.
- **center**: The center point of the item’s frame rectangle.
- **transform**: The transform applied to the item, relative to the center of its bounds.
